org.directwebremoting.util
Class FakeHttpServletResponse

java.lang.Object
  org.directwebremoting.util.FakeHttpServletResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
public class FakeHttpServletResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse

Mock implementation of the HttpServletResponse interface.

Author:
Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller, Joe Walker [joe at getahead dot ltd dot uk]
